javadoc: LocalRandomInputBlockStream provides ability to selectively read a select set of buffers from the LocalBufferFile based upon a specified ChangeMap.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Construct input block stream for specific block indexes
 within the file based upon a changeMap.  The head buffer 
 will never be included in the transfer.

params.name: changeMapData
params.comment:
ChangeMap data which is used in determining which 
 buffers should be streamed

name: LocalRandomInputBlockStream
comment:
LocalRandomInputBlockStream provides ability to
 selectively read a select set of buffers from the LocalBufferFile
 based upon a specified ChangeMap.

fields.javadoc: The bufferIndexList contains the DataBuffer indexes which are to be transferred. Buffer index values plus 1 equal the file block index.
fields.name: bufferIndexList
fields.comment:
The bufferIndexList contains the DataBuffer indexes
 which are to be transferred.  Buffer index values plus 1 equal the 
 file block index.

fields.javadoc:
If the bufferIndexList is not null, this index identifies the next
 entry within the list whose block should be transferred, otherwise
 the index directly identifies the next DataBuffer to be transferred.
fields.name: nextIndex
fields.comment:
If the bufferIndexList is not null, this index identifies the next
 entry within the list whose block should be transferred, otherwise
 the index directly identifies the next DataBuffer to be transferred.
